issue.title: m.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

n/a

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=jNQXAC9IVRw

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. in the "AdGuard – Social Media" filter list, there is a filter that specifically blocks the youtube share button on mobile: 

`m.youtube.com##ytm-button-renderer.icon-share_arrow`

the share button is actually functional and should not be blocked

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: filter list disabled - share button visible</summary>

![share-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/15662785/700505dd-d525-42a8-8d67-85f6dc76b771)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2: filter list enabled - share button hidden</summary>

![share-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/15662785/0994a0f1-aa49-4a01-af5c-80b334b9d9f6)

</details>

3. request: please remove this filter

the list is intended for social media annoyances. this is not a share button on a third party website like social media buttons

it does not make sense to block a button that is actually functional on the first party website itself

especially since it is *not* blocked on the desktop site, where it is arguably less useful.

the share button actually delivers useful functionality for copying short links to the video. this is particularly useful on mobile because copying the address bar will copy the URL to the mobile site

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

pull_request.title: Fix https://github.com/mullvad/mullvad-browser/issues/170 bilibili.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
vd_source on bilibili

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
The vd_source parameter is used for tracking on bilibili.com

### Enter the issue address

N/A

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

1. Your comment

bilibili does use history.replaceState to bypass AdGuard/uBo and add this parameter, but it is removed when the page is reloaded.
There is not an issue in the issue tracker, so I had to skip some of the steps.

2. Screenshots



### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: wallstmemes.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.15 (4385) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome, Microsoft Edge ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter, Adblock Warning Removal List ### Security _No response_ ### Other Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific AdGuard French filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI ### Add your comment and screenshots Problem: When connecting to the MetaMask wallet to view the tokens, the webpage does not load correctly. The token count always displays as 0 when the “Hide your Referer from third parties” stealth option is selected. There is no need to have any tokens to see when the problem is resolved. Instead, we can look at the top of the page. The section above the “Buy on Uniswap” button displays a refresh animation instead of showing text. The HTML code for this part is: `

Buy and stake $WSM now!

Stake $WSM now to earn rewards. Staked tokens can be withdrawn after 7 days since you last updated your stake. Use 0xB62E45c3Df611dcE236A6Ddc7A493d79F9DFadEf to add $WSM to your wallet
Your staked WSM = 0
Your stakeable WSM = 0
` I fixed the problem by adding this custom rule: `@@||convincing-prettiest-firefly.quiknode.pro^$domain=token.wallstmemes.com,third-party` Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install the MetaMask Chrome extension and create an account (this only takes a few seconds). 2. Visit the webpage https://token.wallstmemes.com/en#staking 3. Select the MetaMask wallet ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition
